programme.title: Small Trouble
programme.desc: Agidi, a troublesome village girl, travels to stay with Bridget in the city. This decision is about to destroy Bridgets plan for Henry and make Agidis life better.

programme.title: Heart Of A Friend
programme.desc: Dinma trusts Nkechi, but Nkechi is bent on destroying the relationship between Dinma and her best friend Udala. This is all because a prince loves Dinma more.

programme.title: Royal Hatred
programme.desc: After the death of the second queen, Kambilis mum, the king is also killed. Now, the throne is empty, and a queen must be crowned, the battle of who will wear the crown begins.

programme.title: Heaven
programme.desc: Chukwuebuka is duped after he did all travel out of the country to play for a football club in Europe, this incident takes the life of his mom but Nurse Uju comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Mmadiya wants her sons to marry from Ajaani. Adanna and Nnanna share an experience.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Tensions heat up in the fall out of Ajaanis invasion. Love blooms even in the chaos, and someone returns victorious.

programme.title: Hand Of Justice
programme.desc: After Igwe Eloke impregnated a young lady, she runs away to a far away land. 25 years later, something strange happens to him.

programme.title: Love At Bay
programme.desc: After countless instances of bullying from Alice, Maya discovers that their single parents have fallen in love. The two girls must navigate their complicated feelings.

programme.title: Emergency Meeting
programme.desc: Henry, a police officer, and Chidi, an armed robber are both in love with the same woman, and a fight for her heart is about to ignite a war that will turn the ghetto upside down.

programme.title: Innocence Between Walls
programme.desc: Dimitri is about to let out all secrets as Mrs. Elizabeth is killed in her apartment and all fingers points to Abigail, Mrs. Elizabeth daughter.

programme.title: Life As It Is
programme.desc: Ife is informed that she could never bear children. Crushed by the weight of infertility and frustration in her matrimonial home, she finds solace in the arms of another.

programme.title: Turn By Turn
programme.desc: Gbemisola and Efe are married to Friday who is in need of a child desperately and decides to marry another woman, but this is just the beginning of their war.

programme.title: Cat And Rat
programme.desc: Annabel is in Gregs life just to rip him, her deceit and perfect manipulation works perfectly on him. However, the rat in the house will frustrate this cat out of the house.

programme.title: Local King
programme.desc: A queen is determined to ensure her son ascends the throne after her husbands death. However, the story takes an unexpected turn when her sons fate diverges from the crown.

programme.title: Chasing Clout
programme.desc: Collette will do anything to have a perfect relationship, but her man Richard will always be the bully he is.

programme.title: Home Trouble
programme.desc: Korkor lost his mother at a young age and his father decides to bring in his estranged wife with her son. This topples the entire family, and a truth is revealed.

programme.title: Delivery Agent

programme.title: The Cab Man

programme.title: Come Back To Me
programme.desc: Nancy is supposed to marry Chucks, but she lost the chance to her twin sister Jane because of Nmecha her fiancee who has promised her marriage for over 10 years.

programme.title: Lies Men Tell
programme.desc: Patrick secretly juggled two families: a wife and daughter in one home, and a pregnant fiancee in another. His carefully constructed lie shatters the moment the two women meet.

programme.desc: Tracking down various unsavoury elements who owe money to their boss, two debt collectors find another crook is on their trail.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed

programme.desc: A teenagers plans to spend a lazy summer are dashed thanks to his parents plans, while a family-friendly camping trip turns into a disaster.
